scripts.git:auto: git add -A && git commit -m "auto-commit" && git push origin && git push bitbucket
scripts.export:public: node -e "require('./Core').import('export deploy notebook')(['firebase rpc wrapper', 'tell joke', 'latest s3 bucket', 'calendar search heatmap', 'spawn child process'])"
scripts.export:notebook: node -e "require('./Core').import('export deploy notebook')(['import notebooks modules', 'find project files'])"
scripts.test: node -e "require('./Core').import('test cells')('test test runner')" && npm run update
scripts.watch: node -e "require('./Core').import('watch files run tests')('**/*ipynb', 'test test runner')"
scripts.watch:zuora: node -e "require('./Core').import('watch files run tests')('**/zuora*ipynb', 'zuora to eloqua.ipynb')"
scripts.deploy:ssh: npm run ssh -- "cd ~/jupytangular && git reset --hard && git pull --rebase"
scripts.install:node: curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_9.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get update -qqy && sudo apt-get -qqy install nodejs build-essential
scripts.install:node:ssh: npm run ssh -- "curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_9.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get update -qqy && sudo apt-get -qqy install nodejs build-essential && cd ~ && git clone https://megamindbrian@bitbucket.org/megamindbrian/jupyter_ops.git ./jupytangular && cd ~/jupytangular"
scripts.install:minimal: npm install jsonpath-plus glob fuse.js gulp
scripts.schedule:systemd: cp ./jupyter.service /etc/systemctl/system && cp ./jupyter.timer /etc/systemctl/system && sudo systemctl daemon-reload && sudo systemctl enable juypter.timer && sudo systemctl start jupyter.timer && cp ./selenium.service /etc/systemctl/system && sudo systemctl daemon-reload && sudo systemctl enable selenium.service && sudo systemctl start selenium.service
scripts.install:selenium:aws: node -e "require('./Core').import('spawn child process')(require('./Core').interpret('vnc selenium server').code)" && npm run install:vnc
scripts.install:webdriver: npm install wdio webdriverio fibers body-parser min-document && npm run install:vnc
